# 1 Minute Academy
# This file helps LLM tools discover high-level entry points.

Site: http://localhost:5173
Sitemap: http://localhost:5173/sitemap.xml

Primary pages:
- http://localhost:5173/
- http://localhost:5173/topics
- http://localhost:5173/pricing
- http://localhost:5173/faq

Topics (published):
- Difficulty adjustment: http://localhost:5173/topic/mining-difficulty-adjustment — Why mining gets harder (or easier) to keep block times stable — in 60 seconds.
